name: Me First
description: When targeted by or forced to make a saving throw from a single-target move, you may use your reaction to copy the creatureâ€™s move against it, after activation but before the effects. If the move requires an attack roll, you have disadvantage on the attack. If the move requires a saving throw, the target has advantage on the roll. If the move causes damage, double the damage dice. The damage/effect tier for the move is based off of your level, not the target's.

contest.effect: Causes the user to move earlier on the next turn.
